name: Pairidaeza
description:
Pairidaeza is a romance set in the final days of the Abbasid Caliphate. The player plays as Ridwan, a nobleman of Greek/Anatolian origin in a secret relationship with Jafar, a son of the Caliph himself.  

Throughout the game, the player will explore history, culture, and religion (and wine) as they spend an eventful night wooing the Prince of Baghdad.

Play in fullscreen mode with headphones for the optimal experience.

All audio is from freesound.org

"Santur" by  Peyman Heydarian, School of Oriental and African Studies of London

Made for Pride month. Released on Eid-ul-Fitr 2018
